outputs.output_descr: The Joint Program consists of 3 components that support to each other. i) Improvement of the capacities of local administration, 2.Sabancı Foundation Grant Program to Women CSOs, Universities 3.Purple Certificate Program that has been developed by Sabancı University  to enable high school teachers to develop a critical gender perspective.

project_descr: Programme aims to accelerate the implementation of gender equality commitments at a local level and contribute to development of sustainable capacities to promote, protect and exercise women's rights.
project_title: UNJP for Promoting the Human Rights of Women
